definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
Henri Poincaré (1854-1912), French mathematician, physician and philosopher
Pang De (-219), general of Cao Wei at the start of the Three Kingdoms period, victor over Guan Yu 關羽|关羽/Pound (name)/Ezra Pound (1885-1972), American poet and translator
Jean-Marie Le Pen (1928-), French Front National extreme right-wing politician
Pompeii, ancient Roman town near Naples, Italy
Pompeium, Roman town in Bay of Naples destroyed by eruption of Vesuvius in 79/Pompey (Roman general)
Pang Juan (-342 BC), military leader and political strategist of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
Ponzi (name)/Pond's (brand of skin care products), also written 旁氏

sentences.english: Persky tucked the bills in his pants pocket and turned toward his bookcase.
sentences.chinese: 龐先生把錢塞進褲袋然後轉身向着他的書架。

sentences.english: Ponti worried Jackie remember previously I had participated in the kidnapping Jackie.
sentences.chinese: 龐很擔憂傑姬記起以前本人曾經參與過綁架傑姬的事。

sentences.english: Madam Pomfrey had given the Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher a Sleeping Potion.
sentences.chinese: 龐弗雷夫人給了她一付安眠藥水。

sentences.english: Ponti very afraid Jackie instauration memory.
sentences.chinese: 龐很懼怕傑姬恢復記憶。

sentences.english: Punchinello walked up the narrow path and stepped into Eli's shop. His eyes grew big.
sentences.chinese: 龐切尼克走過一條窄路，進到以萊的店裏。

sentences.english: The Zhuo knows far Wu the face is a morsel painful of say.
sentences.chinese: 卓知遠捂着臉龐有些痛苦的說道。

sentences.english: Mr. Pang said that he preferred the “outlet stores” in the United States, “where everything is cheaper.”
sentences.chinese: 而龐先生則表示更傾向於美國的工廠直營店。

sentences.english: Persky rapped three times on the cabinet and then flung open the doors.
sentences.chinese: 龐先生輕拍了櫃子三下然後猛地打開兩扇門。
龐弗雷夫人看起來憂心忡忡。

sentences.english: Disabled Sun Bin was not discouraged and tricked Pang Juan by pretending to be mad .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏殘疾後，並不氣餒，靠裝瘋騙過了龐涓。

sentences.english: "Let me think about it, " Persky said.
sentences.chinese: “讓我來琢磨琢磨，”龐先生說道。

sentences.english: Sun Bin did much better than Pang Juan and Pang Juan was deeply jealous of him .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏的學業遠遠勝於龐涓，龐涓很嫉妒他。

sentences.english: Sun Bin did much better than Pang Juan and Pang Juan was deeply jealous of him .
sentences.chinese: 孫臏的學業遠遠勝於龐涓，龐涓很嫉妒他。

definition: to gallop/to assist/to attack/to wade/great/old variant of 憑|凭[ping2]

Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
(bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
surname Wu/area comprising southern Jiangsu, northern Zhejiang and Shanghai/name of states in Southern China at different historical periods
